root.name: Paper Toss
root.description: Paper Toss is a simple game. Players use their finger to throw paper balls across a room into a trash can. The higher the difficulty, the farther away the trash can is. To add more difficulty, the developers added a fan, to disrupt the ball's flight. The fan changes strength randomly after every toss of the paper ball. The fan also chooses randomly to either blow the ball left or right.
